projects.name: StarCraft II Stalker Rush Bot
projects.description: A C++ bot designed for a Protoss Stalker Rush strategy. 70% win rate against CheatMoney and CheatVision difficulties, and around 45% against CheatInsane.

projects.name: ED-like Text Editor
projects.description: A modern take on the classic ed editor from the 60s. This text editor supports many of the commands from the original ed.

projects.name: Text Klondike
projects.description: A text-based version of Klondike Solitaire. The challenge here is that the table isn't always visible, so you'll need to remember where you placed your cards!

projects.name: Sanctuary
projects.description: An action stealth game built with JavaScript and RPG Maker MV. Set in a distant future where Earth is gone, you control The Sanctuary, a spaceship carrying cat-like androids and a few humans. Explore the ship and uncover its secrets.

projects.name: Excalibur's Renewal
projects.description: A short RPG created with JavaScript and RPG Maker MV. Follow a young knight on a quest to secure a good harvest for his town, Marisacordia. He must venture beyond the town's borders, an act forbidden by law. Along the way, he discovers the truth about his town's prosperity and faces a tough decision.

projects.name: Naive Bayes Document Classifier
projects.description: A simple document classifier that uses Naive Bayes to sort documents into different categories.

projects.name: Self Driving Car Simulator
projects.description: Trains and tests self-driving cars using neural networks in a Udacity-based car simulator. Built with PyTorch.

projects.name: Edge Filter
projects.description: An image filter that highlights edges in images. (Used in my profile picture!)

projects.name: NodeNet
projects.description: A social media platform where users can sign up, log in, post images, and make friends. It allows users to share moments and connect with others in a community setting.
